repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Labels used by textile manufacturers to identify their materials.
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English, French, German, Latin, Spanish, Hausa

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of the labels used by textile manufacturers to identify their materials. These labels range from simple identification tags to works of art. At their simplest the labels are little more than blank pieces of paper on which the manufacturer, type of cloth, and yardage can be written. The illustrated labels can be anything from simple line drawings to elaborate works of late-19th and early-20th century art, both serious and whimsical.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Not all of the cloth labels are described individually. Only those which had descriptions from the American Textile History Museum (ATHM) have item-level descriptions here.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ATHM Textile Industry Cloth Labels #6524/003 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
